meanings.definition: A support for holding a book open while reading.
meanings.sent1: I used a bookrest to keep my book open while studying.
meanings.sent2: The bookrest on the table helped me read comfortably.
meanings.sent3: The bookrest decided to take a break and let the book close on its own.
meanings.sent4: Her hands were like a bookrest, keeping the pages from turning in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The bookrest was like a loyal friend, always there to hold the book open for me.

meanings.definition: A stand or support for holding a book upright on a table.
meanings.sent1: The bookrest on the table displayed the book beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I placed the book on the bookrest to keep it upright.
meanings.sent3: The bookrest and the book had a friendly chat about their favorite stories.
meanings.sent4: The bookrest stood tall like a soldier, guarding the book from falling.
meanings.sent5: The bookrest stood proudly, showing off the book for all to see.

meanings.definition: A device used to keep a book open and in place while not in use.
meanings.sent1: The bookrest kept the pages of the book in place when I wasn't reading.
meanings.sent2: I always use a bookrest to hold my book open on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The bookrest played hide and seek with the book, trying to keep it open.
meanings.sent4: The bookrest was like a bookmark, holding the book open at the right page.
meanings.sent5: The bookrest was a lifesaver, preventing the book from closing on its own.
